definition: lit. Cheng Yaojin ambushes the enemy (saying)/fig. sb shows up unexpectedly and disrupts the plan/sb whose presence is regarded as irksome
pinyin: ban4 lu4 sha1 chu1 ge4 Cheng2 Yao3 jin1

definition: half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half
to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
